---Soundwave.Switcblade.Frenzy.Astrotrain---

Switcblade bows sarcasticly to Frenzy, "Well, it's good to see you 
to Frenzy. Welcome back Soundwave." Switcblade twirls his twin 
welders, and finishes welding on the last piece of plate armour for 
that Firestrike's new leg. "What can I do for you two?" He smiles 
nonchalantly as he leans against the wall.

Soundwave is about to speak when he is interupted by a commlink from 
Astrotrain. "Astrotrain here, I'm heading to Africa now, can you 
upload the coordinates of Spasstik to me?" Soundwave turns and stars 
walking to the control room, "One moment, Soundwave will bring 
update you." Soundwave leaves Frenzy and Switchblade in the lab.

When he reaches the control room, he reaches for a keyboard, and 
types a few commands into it. A visual display of where Spasstik is 
appears on the monitors. "Astrotrain, head to these coordinates." 
Soundwave uploads the coordinates to Astrotrain.

Astrotrain transforms into Train mode, and starts accelerating. He 
transforms into Shuttle mode, and peels away from the ground, as he 
heads towards Africa. "Be there in about 30 mins, Astrotrain out."

Soundwave stands there impassivly.

-----------------------------------------

Meanwhile, back at Switcblade's lab,

Switcblade's right eyebrow rises, "You're still here?"

Frenzy frowns, "Your tin can doesn't pull enough weight... we bust 
our bust and get our asses kicked, and you laze around and drive our 
ship..." Frenzy shakes his head.

Switchblade slowly walks across the room, to a table with a wierd 
looking piece of equipment, or a body part or something. Frenzy 
keeps his eyes on the Switchblade, not trusting him for a moment.

Switchblade picks up the thing, and points on end at Frenzy, "This, 
my friend, is what I like to call an incinerator. In this case, it 
could incinerate you... or not." He picks up a piece of discarded 
shrapnel, and smiles, "Watch and learn." He tosses the piece up, 
aims the thing at it, and as the shrapnel reaces the maximum height 
of it's trajectory, a burst of white hot fire spears out of now 
apparent weapon, melting the shrapnel into a little puddle at 
Frenzy's feet. "Now, when you've got something you want to say to 
me, come back." Switchblade levels the weapon at Frenzy.

Frenzy's eyes widden, and twitch from side to side, as the display 
unfolds.  "I, uhh, bye!" He backs out of the room, and slowly down 
the hall, back where he came from.

Switchblade smiles. <Foolish Frenzy> He chuckles to himself, and 
continues his work.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Spasstik begins bounding away from the battlefield, holding 
Megatron
> carefully in his jaw.
> 
> Frenzy arrives at the docked base holding onto Soundwave. (rAuq,
> whenever you want him, take him). Soundwave leaps into the air
> unfolding, and transforming into his large robot mode. He presses a
> button on his chest, opening a link to Astrotrain. "Astrotrain, 
pick up
> Spasstik from Africa, then bring Abominus and the ship." He walks 
into
> the ship followed by Frenzy, until he reaches Switchblade's lab.
> 
> Frenzy folds his arms with a smug look on his face. "Long time no 
see,
> Switchblade." he finishes with a small hint of disdain in his 
voice.
